column.name: TYPE_DESC
column.value: Indicates the credential that was awarded

column.name: TYPE_DESC
column.value: Indicates the number of credits the student earned for successfully completing the course. Often done via a calculation by looking at the calculated grade and either awarding the number of attempted credits if it is a passing grade.

column.name: TYPE_DESC
column.value: Administrative Grade that was recorded for this student

column.name: TYPE_DESC
column.value: Grade as it was originally submitted by the faculty member on the grade sheet.

column.name: TYPE_DESC
column.value: Grade calculated based on the scale or option chosen and the grade actually submitted by the faculty member.

column.name: TYPE_DESC
column.value: Grade assigned during at an interim period often used to flag students who might be struggling

column.name: TYPE_DESC
column.value: The ranking of the student within the peer group who took the test during the same time period. Often recorded as a percentage or a decile

column.name: TYPE_DESC
column.value: A score a student got by taking standardized test.
